• 신호탄은 상자에서 얻거나 상점에서 구입할 수 있습니다.
• 왼쪽 HUD가 필요하셨죠? 새로 추가했습니다! 설정에서 활성화하세요.
• PvP 매치의 안정성이 크게 향상되었습니다.
• 오류를 수

• Added support for iPhone XS and iPhone XS Max.
• Halloween is coming! Updated visuals, Pumpkin Town Center, and more horrific stuff! ARE YOU READY?
• Halloween events: PvP with Trick or Treat, Zombie Horde with Pumpkin Zombies.

• Region 6 will be available soon! Unravel the mysteries of the underground railroads!
• In the new chapter of the story you will encounter Martin Veillon, the mastermind behind the zombie viruses!
• Capture the Intel: new PvP mode!

• NEW FEATURE: GEAR UPGRADE
• Use TAPE and improve properties of your gear items. Get Tape by selling gear and from certain crates.
• All gear items give a bonus to Hero HP now.
• Metro PvP map update: shoot the Fuse Box and electrocute your enem

• All gear items give a bonus to Hero HP now.
• Metro PvP map update: shoot the Fuse Box and electrocute your enem

• More PvP servers: improved network performance around the world!
• Added rank floors within PvP season: you cannot drop below Rank 5, 10, 15, and all ranks between 20 and 25.
• Stars are no longer lost on lower PvP ranks.
• Increased damage of

• Chapter 7: Cheyenne Mountain is now available!
• The story continues: expose the zombie conspiracy of the New Earth Republic.
• 16 new weapons with detailed visuals.
• New locations: airfield, military installation and underground zombie lab.

∙ Brand new CLANS! We've added new clan features and new clan UI.
Clan Perks: empower your game by being a member of an active clan!
Clan Seasons: get Clan Points, score high in Clan Season leaderboards, and receive clan perks and rewards.
Server functionality improvements, bug fixes
Server functionality improvements, bug fixes
Server functionality improvements, bug fixes

∙ Guaranteed rewards in certain Crates: with mystery crate purchases you get closer to receiving a guaranteed prize.
∙ Zombie TV: watch video ads to get increasing rewards and Hero Crates!
∙ A new setting to enable/disable blood effects.
∙ Per

∙ Ever dreamt of a faithful companion to guard your settlement? It's time to get your German shepherd!
∙ The dog is always present on your base. It brings rewards and prizes every 8 hours.
∙ New SPEED UP items can save you 1 hour of building constru

∙ EXPEDITIONS: new adventures for your heroes!
∙ Earn Expedition Coordinates to send your heroes on the most challenging missions.
∙ After successful expeditions, your heroes will become fatigued. While they rest, use other heroes to beat more exped

∙ REGION 8: Fight for the Railroads and reach Kirland Industries!
∙ The story continues with brand new enemies to battle.
∙ EVOLUTION FOR HEROES: make your heroes more powerful!
∙ With each new Star, heroes gain more HP and better perk improvemen

∙ ACTIVE ABILITIES: each hero now has an active ability that you can activate in battle.
∙ Five Active Abilities: Molotov Cocktail, Frost Grenade, Painkiller, Adrenaline, and Armor Plates.
∙ Molotov Cocktail: sets enemies on fire.
∙ Frost Grenade

New weapon progression system – Attachments!

Disassemble your old weapons and get brand new Attachments for your favorite guns (requires Town Center level 10).
Fuse Attachments to improve them and get unique Perks.

4.1.0 Update changes
NEW SEASON - SERPENTARIUM.
If you're not scared of snakes now, you will be—they're strong, fast, and powerful. Get stuck in their flow and you won't stand a chance! Even Zombies will be snake food.
- Double your firepower!

4.1.0 Update changes
NEW SEASON - SERPENTARIUM.
If you're not scared of snakes now, you will be—they're strong, fast, and powerful. Get stuck in their flow and you won't stand a chance! Even Zombies will be snake food.
- Double your firepower!

Thank you very much for your feedback on the new matchmaking system!
